reviewText: This gift boxed item was a smile pleaser indeed. The college guys enjoyed it tremendously. Even made the older ones come sit down so we all had fun watching together. A great entertainment for a rainy day to keep you on edge of this wild and wonderful scenes. It has everything and more than you can imagine.

If you're not a Travis Pastrana fan, you will be after wathing these movies. The tricks these guys pull off are amazing. There's non-stop action from the minute you start watching to the end. Each DVD has something for everyone from freestyle motocross, of course, to monster trucks, snowmobiles, extreme mountain biking, base jumping, supercross, rally racing, enduro racing and much more! This collection was money well spent in my mind. Thanks Amazon and Ocean Media!
